terrapeer.vui.j3dui.control.mappers
Class ObjectPickMapper

java.lang.Object
  terrapeer.vui.j3dui.control.mappers.ObjectPickMapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
EnableTarget, InputDragTarget, InputMoveTarget
public class ObjectPickMapper
extends java.lang.Object
implements InputMoveTarget, InputDragTarget, EnableTarget

Maps display move and drag event inputs into object pick events. Object pick events are generated only when the pick target changes, not when the pick cursor position changes. Can be configured for general use or specifically for dragging or dropping.

Constructor Summary

          Constructs a ObjectPickMapper with pick engine with the pickable node list, and event target .

setDoPick

public void setDoPick(boolean doPick)
Specifies the manner of drag picking. Move picking is unaffected.

Parameters:
doPick - If true, drag picking is reported when the drag starts and "no target" is reported when the drag stops. Default is true.

setDoDrag

public void setDoDrag(boolean doDrag)
Specifies the manner of drag picking. Move picking is unaffected.

Parameters:
doDrag - If true, drag picking is reported when the drag starts. Default is false.

setDoDrop

public void setDoDrop(boolean doDrop)
Specifies the manner of drag picking. Move picking is unaffected.

Parameters:
doDrop - If true, drag picking is reported during the drag and when it stops (but after any "no target" report). Default is false.

getEnable

public boolean getEnable()
Gets the enable state.

Returns:
True if enabled.

updatePick

protected void updatePick(javax.media.j3d.Canvas3D source,
                          javax.vecmath.Vector2d pos)
Determines the current pick status according to the position in the source space and, if the status changed, generates an output event.

Parameters:
source - Source display canvas. Never null.
pos - position relative to source space.

updateNoPick

protected void updateNoPick()
Forces the pick status to "no pick" and, if the status changed, generates an output event.
